summary: Implements a TensorFlow Keras layer that performs graph convolution on heterogeneous graphs by applying separate sub-modules for each relation type, gathering destination node features, and merging them using a configurable aggregation method. Includes a helper to obtain the appropriate aggregation operation.
business_intent: Provide a reusable component for building heterogeneous graph neural networks in TensorFlow, simplifying multi-relation message passing and feature aggregation.
